name: Resurse Crestine
description: Resurse Cretine este un concept pornit la iniiativa ctorva tineri dornici s pun la dispoziia fiecruia o gam variat de resurse exclusiv cretine, organizate ntr-o baz de date cuprinztoare, care s constituie ajutor i hran pentru (lucrtori) cretini, indiferent de denominaiune, dar i o fereastr spre lume, lucrnd mpreun la avansarea mpriei lui Dumnezeu. Christian resources is a concept started at the initiative of several young people eager to provide everyone a variety of resources exclusively Christian, organized a comprehensive database that will provide help and food (workers) Christians, regardless of denomination, but and a window to the world, working together to advancing the kingdom of God.
